title: Fork, 1985-103-32, ca. 1550
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Four-tined fork, sloping shoulders. Neck pierced with trefoil. Scroll stem at neck, paired knops on cylindrical stem. Finial flat openwork scrolls surrounding movable openwork knop with loose bead inside.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
